Package ca.gedge.opgraph.app.components

Provides a set of components for the Application API.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PathAddressableMenu A menu that provides path-based addressing, to make menu-building a simpler task.
 

Class Summary
BreadcrumbViewer<S,V> A breadcrumb component.
ConsolePanel A component to show debug information on a node.
ContextViewerPanel A component to show inputs and output values from a node's OpContext.
DoubleClickableTextField A text field that begins editing on double-click.
ErrorDialog A dialog that displays an exception to the user.
NodeDefaultsPanel A panel for displaying and editing default values for a node's input fields.
NodeSettingsPanel A panel for displaying and editing settings for a node.
NullLayout A special version of a null layout which takes care of resizing children to their preferred size, and computing sizing preferences based on the children.
PathAddressableMenuImpl An implementation of PathAddressableMenu that operates on a given menu element.
ResizeGrip A grip component that will resize a given component when dragged over.
SearchField A search field with optional context button.
 

Enum Summary
SearchField.FieldState Text field state
 

Package ca.gedge.opgraph.app.components Description

Provides a set of components for the Application API.
